page.title: 19Local Businesses
page.content: in Autumn.They have{1 bull}but they can make them pregnant by machine.A cow can have{15 calves}and they can give birth on their own.The oldest cow is{17.}They sell cattle at{Beeston {Market}and the vet visits the farm every month. Their main machine is a {scraper}which mucks out the cubicles. They have two{tractors}which have a working life of{5000 hrs.}They can fit {1000 bales}in their loft.They harvest {4000 bales of hay and 4000 bales of {straw.}They put{900 tons of silage}in their pit.In winter they feed the cows {barley. There are{9 horses,3 farm cats and 8 {dogs}which makes about{100 animals altogether. Mr.Willett shares machinery with other local farmers to keep his costs down.
